column6: All the details you need to know about Wolverine's mysterious past and his place in the House of M can be found right here!  The simmering war between Logan, Agent of S.H.I.E.L.D., and the leader of the human resistance movement, Nick Fury, comes to a boil.  And only one of them's going to come out alive.
column8: | penciller (cover):Kaare Andrews | letterer:Randy Gentile | colorist:Paul Mounts | penciller:Javier Saltares | inker:Mark Texeira | writer:Daniel Way
